Articles.Content:
Hello everyone

I play KSP with lot of mods with lot of fun :-)

With the [0.24] I'm "enduring" very specials problems.

When i switch from a satellite to another, the focus one now have several part who have disappears. If i reload a quick-save game the same problem occur. Could it be a mods problems or a KSP setting problem ?

Best Regards B. Heinrich (apologize for my poor english)

List of some of my mods :

KSP: 0.25 (Win32) - Unity: 4.5.2f1 - OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 (6.1.7601) 64bit

Chatterer - 0.7.1.86

CIT - CIT_Util - 1.0.4

CIT - KERT - 1.1.2

Community Resource Pack - 0.2.2

DMagic Orbital Science - 0.8.6.1

Fine Print - 0.59

RasterPropMonitor - 0.18.3

Kerbal Joint Reinforcement - 2.4.4

KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.5

Modular Rocket Systems - 0.7

Final Frontier - 0.5.9.177

ORSX - 0.1.2

RealChute - 1.2.5.2

SCANsat - 1.0.8

StageRecovery - 1.5.1

USI Exploration Pack - 0.2.4

USI Tools - 0.2.3
I believe this is a RealChute issue when using Stock parachutes. It doesn't happen when using the Realchute parts.
Update Real Chute to 1.2.5.3, that should fix it.
